title: just factory reset my phone after failing to install android 10, what a disappointment. and now i
content:
just factory reset my phone after failing to install android 10, what a disappointment.

and now i cant log into my account because of the 2-step verification, i cant use the phone verification   i need to wait few hours it says, i really cant wait that much, nor the tap yes on your phone or tablet because it says device cant be reached right now. the last option is use your phone or tablet to get a security code. i cant do that because i just factory reset  and there isn't any account in the device atm.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
